actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation, and Public Lands

official_title: To direct the Secretary of the Interior to study the suitability and feasibility of designating certain lands along the southern coast of Maui, Hawaii, as a unit of the National Park System.
short_title: South Maui Coastal Preservation Act of 2005

summary.text: South Maui Coastal Preservation Act of 2005 - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to study the feasibility of designating certain lands on the southern coast of Maui, Hawaii, extending from the Ahihi-Kinau Natural Area Reserve to Kanaloa Point, as a unit of the National Park System.

titles.title: South Maui Coastal Preservation Act of 2005
To direct the Secretary of the Interior to study the suitability and feasibility of designating certain lands along the southern coast of Maui, Hawaii, as a unit of the National Park System.
